Bike shop owner who gave Prince Archie a £240 bicycle for his 4th birthday says she picked the model because it's 'gender neutral' and can be passed on to Lili 
12/06/23 02:39
Jennifer Blevins, co-owner of the Mad Dogs & Englishmen Bike Shop in Montecito, California, told Hello! magazine that she and her husband Martin chose the bike so the Sussexes could reuse it. Prince Archie (pictured left with his family in their Christmas card in 2021), turned four on 6 May, the same day as King Charles's coronation. Last week Jennifer and Martin (Martin pictured right) posted a thank you letter they had received from the Sussexes a month after they had sent Archie a Specalized bike with stabilisers, costing £240 ($300).
